General.Name: Anyang Iron & Steel Inc
General.Description: Anyang Iron and Steel Co., Ltd. engages in manufacture and sale of steel products by using processing technology in China and internationally. It offers medium and heavy plates, board strips, altitude, cast pipes and other products, billets, hot-rolled and cold-rolled coils, high-speed wire rods, building materials, and profiles. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Anyang, China. Anyang Iron and Steel Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Anyang Iron and Steel Group Co., Ltd.

4.Name: Mr. Chengxu  Guo
4.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors
